name: talent-factory
description: Professional Claude Code plugins for software development and education

plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Professional git workflow with automated pre-commit checks, emoji conventional commits, PR management, intelligent merge conflict resolution, and comprehensive references

plugins.name: project-management
plugins.description: Comprehensive project management with PRD generation, project planning, single-task initialization with duplicate detection and ATOMIC validation, intelligent task implementation with plugin orchestration (Superpowers brainstorm, agent routing, quality gate), autonomous EPIC automation, Linear integration, and git worktree workflow for agile development

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Comprehensive code quality with Python linting and expert agents for Python and Frontend development

plugins.name: education
plugins.description: Teaching aids with Java Tutor agent, Markdown syntax formatter agent and skill, and code explanation for IT education

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Comprehensive development utilities with 7 commands, 2 skills, and 2 expert agents for plugin/command/agent development, validation, CI automation, text humanization, and PDF-to-Markdown conversion

plugins.name: obsidian
plugins.description: Obsidian Integration - Task management via TaskNotes Plugin API with natural language support and vault-wide scanning

plugins.name: development
plugins.description: Expert development agents, project initialization with Git branching, Java/Gradle, Python/uv, and documentation synchronization tools
